## Selected News / Articles Featuring our Research

**July 1, 2025**. Dr. Young was interviewed and quoted in a [BBC article about hygiene in public swimming pools](https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20250630-how-hygienic-are-public-swimming-pools-really).

**October 31, 2024**. Choose TMU [promotional video about the Public Health program and recreational water course](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/4Vm6OrSb5rA) taught by Dr. Young.

**October 17, 2024**. National Collaborating Centre for Environmental Health (NCCEH) [blog post about our group's research on environmental predictors of recreational water quality in Canada](https://ncceh.ca/resources/blog/environmental-predictors-recreational-water-quality-canada).

**July 29, 2024**. Dr. Young was interview live on BT about [beach water quality and the Beach Cohort Study](https://www.breakfasttelevision.ca/videos/why-it-can-be-unsafe-to-swim-at-local-beaches-after-heavy-rainfall).

**July 4, 2024**. Research featured by the Office of the Vice-President, Research & Innovation, TMU: [Making Canadian beaches even safer](https://www.torontomu.ca/research/news-events/2024/07/making-canadian-beaches-even-safer/).
